series_name.series_title: International Conference on Computer Graphics and Interactive Techniques

abstract.par: Interweave your senses with this year's finest film and video achievements by the world's most creative scientists, entertainers, superstars, vagabonds, studios, and students. The Computer Animation Festival presents selected works in the Electronic Theater (matinee and evening shows) and the Animation Theater (throughout the week).
